Package Management

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

https://www.openbsdhandbook.com/package_management

Info

  • List all installed packages:

    $ pkg_info -A

  • List manually installed packages:

    $ pkg_info -m

  • List which packages require package:

    $ pkg_info -R <PKG>

  • List all files provided by package:

    $ pkg_info -L <PKG>

  • Find file package owner:

    $ pkg_info -E <FILE>

Delete

  1. Delete package:

    # pkg_delete <PKG>
